about_the_game:
Trial of the Towers is a free game. This Support Soundtrack is added DLC for those who wish to support Codeblade or listen to the music of Trial of the Towers.

Included Tracks:
01. Overture
02. Link by Link
03. Wielders' Waltz
04. Danger Dormant
05. Free from the Furnace
06. Towering Triumph
07. Engine Running [BONUS]

Songs (.m4a) will be placed in the Steam Directory: ...Steam\steamapps\common\Trial of the Towers\Soundtrack
